Huh... The comments are rather conflicted, some testify that this is indeed a nice doujinshi or not. I shall be personally ranking this doujin from my perspective, so my opinion might not be the same with others'.  The plot is commonly explored throughout the Parody of Goblin Slayer. Goblins raping the female cast, it's not too rare to see one, which puts it in a 6/10 spot. The art is fine, I've seen better like Dark Desire but also way worse so I'll give it a 6/10. Finally, the ending. In each ending of a story, I must feel a sense of emotion afterwards, it must also promt me to reflect and think upon the text. With this, it did make me feel interested in the world of Goblin Slayer in an alternate reality where yes, GS dies and Sword Maiden is no more. It makes me feel interested in that kind of plot, which scores a nice 9/10. Overall, this is quite an average GS doujinshi, I would'nt reccomend it though because there are more GS doujinshis better than this.
